headline: Easy Roasted Red Pepper Hummus
name: Easy Roasted Red Pepper Hummus
description: This roasted red pepper hummus is easy to make in a food processor. It's flavored with garlic, lemon, tahini, and basil for a delicious vegan dip.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, and garlic in the bowl of a food processor; pulse until blended. Add roasted peppers and basil; process until the peppers are finely chopped. Season with salt and pepper.
Transfer hummus to a small bowl, cover, and chill until ready to serve.
